This is my 4th or 5th pair of these glasses and I cant say enough about them. They are oversized and depending on the design you get you will want to look at the letter B as I have found sometimes the foil could be peeling or in this case the black on black the letter B had a slight bubble defect on one side. They have a carrying pouch, cleaning cloth and screwdriver and sometimes some pairs are extra tight behind the ears and this way you run the arms under hot water for a couple minutes and gently massage them outward so they don't pinch.

I love the size of this sunglasses. Great sun coverage. Lovable design and nice color. Comes with a key chain that works as a miniature screw driver in case a screw comes out. Sunnies come with a dust bag. I love the big B on the side. They look like high end glasses. Good price too.
